name: Back Bay Apt on Marlborough St (Hereford St block)
neighborhood_overview: The subway is a 5 minute walk
description:
Back Bay studio on Marlborough St. Nicely decorated apt on prestigious Marlborough St. This apt is in a Back Bay brownstone with a bow window overlooking Marlborough St. Walk to subway, Newbury St, Fenway Park, Boston Public Garden, Back Bay area, Beacon Hill, Downtown and all that Boston has to offer.
Apt has a queen murphy bed.

Other things to note
Garbage is on the basement level.

name: North End 1 Bedroom- CLOSE MGH, Subway, Hanover St
neighborhood_overview: There are over 100 restaurants cafes and shops within in a 2 minute walk.
description:
One bedroom in the North End-1 minute walk to Hanover St-Bostons' Little Italy. Double pullout in the living room. Nicely decorated. Great apt in a awesome location.

Guest access
Guests will have access to the whole apt. This is not a shared space.

name: Beacon Hill Studio - 2 min Walk to MGH-Subway-
description:
Stay in the heart of the city. Beacon Hill studio apartment tastefully decorated. Walk to Mass General, Mass Eye & Ear, Subway, Back Bay, Downtown, North End, Faneuil Hall and much more.
The subway is within a 2-3 minute walk. This apt is centrally located and walking distance to numerous restaurants, cafes, shops, transportation.

The space
The bed has been replaced with a queen murphy bed.

Guest access
Guest have 100% sole access to the apt. This is not a shared apt.

name: Luxury North End (Waterfront) walk to MGH, SUBWAY
description: Large studio apt on Boston's Waterfront (North End area).      There is a queen mahogany murphy bed so in the day time it is a living room and at night it is a bedroom.  There is a comfortable granite breakfast counter to work from.

name: Back Bay studio on Marlborough St (91 night min)
description: Front facing Back Bay studio in a brownstone on Marlborough queen mahogany murphy bed.   Located on the corner of Clarendon St.  Close to the subway and close to many attractions.

name: BACK BAY walk to Berklee, Northeastern, Newbury St
description: Back Bay close to the subway.   Includes utilities including basic cable and wireless internet.   Walk to the subway Berklee, Hynes Convention Center, Northeastern University, Newbury Street, Fenway Park and all the Back Bay has to offer.   Apartment has a queen murphy bed.

name: ONE Bedroom in the Back Bay on Commonwealth Ave
description: ONE bedroom in the Back Bay area of Boston on Commonwealth Ave.  One street over from Newbury St. Walk to the subway, numerous restaurants cafes and shops
